mapper.insert: insert into `user` (email, name, `password`, regDate, `postcode`, address1, address2, phone) values (#{param.id}, #{param.name}, #{param.password}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d'), #{param.postcode}, #{param.address1}, #{param.address2}, #{param.phone})
mapper.select: select * from `user` where email = #{id} and delYn ="N" limit 1
